text: Mariano Laurenti (15 April 1929 â€“ 6 January 2022) was an Italian movie director, screenwriter and actor. He directed 50 movies between 1966 and 1999. His best known movies were Ubalda, All Naked and Warm (1972), The Schoolteacher Goes to Boys' High (1977) and How to Seduce Your Teacher (1979). Laurenti died in Gubbio, Italy on 6 January 2022, at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian movie directors Category:Italian movie producers Category:Italian screenwriters Category:Actors from Rome Category:Writers from Rome
title: Mariano Laurenti
